Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class EventKeeper

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.EventKeeper
public class EventKeeper extends Object
The EventKeeper class is responsible for managing events and notifications in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventKeeper()
    Constructs an EventKeeper object with the given gameplay instance.

  • Method Details

    • addPersonalList

      public void addPersonalList(String id)
      Adds a personal event list for the specified player ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the player ID

    • removePersonalList

      public void removePersonalList(String id)

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(String id, boolean b)
      Updates the status of a player, used to stop the current associated listener.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the selected player

    • checkActivity

      public boolean checkActivity(String id)
      Checks if a listener should stop. This happen if the passed integer is not the same of integer locally associated to the player.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID associated with the listener
      Returns:
      'false' if the listener has to stop, false otherwise

    • isPresentPersonal

      public boolean isPresentPersonal(String id)
      Checks if an event with the given index is present in the personal event list for the specified player ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the player ID
      Returns:
      true if the event is present, false otherwise

    • fixOffset

      public void fixOffset(String id, ReconnectType reconnectType)
      Prepares the queque of events for the specified player ID, according to the ReconnectedType.
      Parameters:
      id - the player ID.
      reconnectType - the flow of events wanted by the client.

    • getListenablePersonal

      public Sendable getListenablePersonal(String id)
      Retrieves the next event (if present) from the personal event list for the specified player ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the player ID
      Returns:
      the Sendable event object, or null if object doesn't exist

    • notifyAll

      public void notifyAll(Sendable sendable)
      Adds the Sendable object to the notification lists of every player connected to the game. The listeners of the players will recover the objects from their list and send them to the client.
      Parameters:
      sendable - the Sendable event object to notify to the clients

    • notifyToID

      public void notifyToID(String id, Sendable sendable)
      Adds the Sendable object to the notification list of the selected player
      Parameters:
      id - the ID that select the player
      sendable - the Sendable event object to notify to the client
